_documentation.description: EDMC Signal Catalog - Comprehensive mapping of Elite Dangerous game state to signals

includes: 200+ event types covering travel, combat, trading, missions, etc.

state.description: Accumulated game state from journal events

signal_organization.core: Most commonly used signals for basic automation
signal_organization.detail: Additional useful signals for advanced rules
signal_organization.advanced: Raw flag values and technical signals for power users

naming_convention.flags: Individual flag values prefixed with 'flag_' for direct bit access
naming_convention.activities: Recent event tracking suffixed with '_activity' (e.g., scan_activity)

state.description: Persistent system name from LoadGame/FSDJump/Location events

journal.description: Recent docking/landing events for edge detection
